sense.def:
Izraz
likewise
uporabimo, kadar primerjamo dve stvari in rečemo, da sta si podobni.

seg.quote: In Yugoslavia there was a special local way of doing it, likewise in Italy.

sense.def:
Kadar storimo eno, nekdo drug pa
does likewise
, ta oseba stori enako kot mi.

seg.quote: He is relaxing and invites them to do likewise.
